proposal: Navigating the world of code can feel like trying to find a needle in a haystack, but Sourceblock makes it a walk in the park for 254 ETH network holders. Imagine pairing your decentralized marketplace with our B2B tools, enabling your community to not just buy and sell code but also to launch their own DEX or host a blockchain lottery. It's about adding layers to your already impressive platform. Let's build together, one block at a time.
